result.purpose: Defines and manages enumerations for various components within the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating related enumerations and utility functions in separate files for clarity and maintainability.

internal/enums/deviceplatform.go.purpose: Defines an enumeration for different device platforms.

internal/enums/devicestatus.go.purpose: Defines an enumeration for device statuses and provides utility methods for their representation.

internal/enums/enums.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for handling enums and their conversions.

internal/enums/pushnotification.go.purpose: Defines enums for push notification providers and recipients.
